slide1.title: Spend your holiday
slide1.subtitle: Your haven of comfort and serenity

about.title: Hotel Le Process
about.description: Welcome to Hotel Le Process, your preferred destination for comfort in the heart of N'Djamena. Our property delivers attentive, personalized service to make your stay unforgettable. Whether you travel for business or relaxation, our dedicated team looks after your well-being at every moment. With spacious rooms, a welcoming atmosphere, and refined dining options, Hotel Le Process in N'Djamena promises an authentic, harmonious, and genuinely warm hotel experience.

rooms.title: Our Rooms
rooms.description: The Deluxe and Standard Single rooms at Hotel Le Process offer a refined retreat with a plush bed, Wi-Fi, smart TV, individual air conditioning, room service, and breakfast included for an intimate, highly comfortable stay.

gallery.title: Our Gallery
gallery.description: Comfort, flavors, and simplicity—explore our spaces to imagine your next experience in N’Djamena.

services.title: SERVICES
services.subtitle: Our Services
services.description: Tailored support and thoughtful amenities to elevate your stay.

restaurant.title: Restaurant & Bar
restaurant.subtitle: Taste the essence of Chadian hospitality
restaurant.introBody: Discover the authentic flavors of Central Africa reimagined with a modern touch. Our chefs prepare every plate with fresh, locally sourced ingredients. Whether breakfast, lunch, or dinner, each moment is designed for your enjoyment.

introPoints.atmosphere: Refined ambiance with a soothing atmosphere
introPoints.service: Attentive service tailored to your preferences

fineDining.title: Fine Dining Room
fineDining.description: A simple, flavourful culinary experience inspired by local traditions and produce.

mixology.title: Signature Mixology
mixology.description: Refreshing beverages, with or without alcohol, crafted to elevate every moment.

rooftop.title: Cosy Lounge
rooftop.description: A warm space to enjoy a dish, dessert, or drink in complete comfort.

restaurant.menuTitle: Our grills, hot dishes, garnishes and starters
restaurant.menuSubtitle: Enjoy our selection of house specialties, side dishes, and salads.
restaurant.ambienceSubtitle: A setting thoughtfully designed for memorable evenings and celebratory gatherings.

gallery.rooftop: Cosy lounge for quiet, relaxed tasting

restaurant.hoursBody: Breakfast 6:30 - 10:30 · Lunch 12:00 - 15:00 · Dinner 18:30 - 22:30 · Bar until late
restaurant.privateEventsBody: Reserve exclusive spaces for celebrations, corporate receptions, and bespoke tastings with our dedicated events team.
restaurant.ctaSubtitle: Connect with our concierge to craft an unforgettable dining journey tailored to your palate.

testimonials.title: What Our Guests Say
testimonials.subtitle: Real experiences from travelers who chose Hotel Le Process
testimonials.quoteVin: Great option for anyone looking for a good value stay in N'Djamena (which is otherwise very expensive!). This is actually Hotel Le Process (location on maps is accurate). Many thanks to Mr Saly who was very helpful in providing advice, arranging an airport transfer for a reasonable price and very responsive in fixing some small issues in the room. Recommend!!
testimonials.quoteBernard: Excellent reception. The proprietor-manager pays attention to details, listens with interest, and provides accurate assistance. He recommended a guide who was exceptional, available, and very knowledgeable. The stay was memorable thanks to the entire Boniface team.
testimonials.quoteHuot: A great hotel with helpful staff and owner. They picked me up and dropped me off at the airport and arranged a driver to drive me around. Restaurant also had affordable and tasty food.

footer.aboutDescription: Experience comfort and hospitality in the heart of N'Djamena. Your home away from home in Chad.

discoverChad.title: Discover Chad
discoverChad.subtitle: Experience the untold beauty of Africa's heart

ennedi.title: Ennedi Massif
ennedi.description: Explore the stunning natural rock formations and ancient rock art in this UNESCO World Heritage site.

zakouma.title: Zakouma National Park
zakouma.description: Witness diverse wildlife including elephants, lions, and hundreds of bird species in their natural habitat.

lakeChad.title: Lake Chad
lakeChad.description: Experience the unique ecosystem of one of Africa's largest freshwater bodies and its surrounding villages.

culture.title: Rich Cultural Heritage
culture.paragraph1: Chad is home to over 200 ethnic groups, each with its own unique traditions, languages, and customs. From the nomadic Tubu people of the north to the Sara people of the south, Chad's cultural diversity is as vast as its landscape.
culture.paragraph2: Experience traditional music, dance, crafts, and cuisine that have been preserved through generations, offering visitors a genuine glimpse into African cultural heritage.

gallery.market: Poudre de chebe pour les cheveux
